revised_title: Alkalized Urine and the Debunking of Spontaneous Generation
tldr: Professor Tyndall conducted experiments with alkalized urine and confirmed that it does not support the theory of spontaneous generation. He also discussed the work of Louis Pasteur, who demonstrated that sterilized urine, when mixed with heated potash, does not develop life. Tyndall's experiments, along with Pasteur's findings, debunked the idea of spontaneous generation.
